data.author: Haruki Murakami
data.quote: Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it.

data.author: Chuck Palahniuk
data.quote: We all die. The goal isn’t to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.

data.author: J K Rowling
data.quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.

data.author: Anais Nin
data.quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: No one is actually dead until the ripples they cause in the world die away.

data.author: Bob Dylan
data.quote: He who is not busy being born is busy dying.

data.author: Charlotte Brontës
data.quote: I feel monotony and death to be almost the same.

data.author: Leo Buscaglia
data.quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time… It tells us to tell each other right now that we love each other.

data.author: Leonardo da Vinci
data.quote: As a well spent day brings happy sleep, so life well used brings happy death.

data.author: Arthur Miller
data.quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.

data.author: Leo Tolstoy
data.quote: Man cannot possess anything as long as he fears death. But to him who does not fear it, everything belongs.

data.author: Buddha
data.quote: Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death can erase our good deeds.

data.author: Mary Macbeth
data.quote: Everyone dies eventually, whether they have power or not. That’s why you need to think about what you’ll accomplish while you’re alive.

data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
data.quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated is to die every day.

data.author: Malcolm X
data.quote: If you’re not ready to die for it, take the word “freedom” out of your vocabulary.

data.author: Joseph Stalin
data.quote: A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic.

data.author: George R.R. Martin
data.quote: Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities.
